text: wilpaththu jathika wanodyanayata uthurin pihiti musali pradeshiya sabhawata ayath janawasa pihiti pradeshaye wana gahanaya sambandhawa nawathama warthawa hektayar 131,667.1 k wapasariyakin yuth wilpaththu jathika wanodyanayata uthurin pihita athi musali pradeshiya sabhawata ayath bala pradeshaya thula uthuru wasanthaya yatathe nawatha padinchi kirim sidu kala muslim pawul sandaha wen wu idam sambandhawa parisara sanwidhana karana lada paminili salakillata gena adala janawasa saha sanwedi parisara paddhathiyata dadi awadhanaya yomu karamin athigaru janadhipathithuman ee pilibanda thiranayak gena thibini.
-- binguwa sakachchawa 17:56, 2 okthobar 2011 (yutisi)
bandaranayaka abhawaya sidu wune 1959 sapthambar 26 da.

hal wi waga kota thibu bim ekala keth hewath hal sena (hal hen)yanuweni.goda idam wala hal wi walata amatharawa udu, mun,ulu hal aadi wu wenath boga wargada labu ,kakiri,batu, aadi wu wenath boga wargada waga kota atha.anuradhapura yugaye mul bhagayedi hen waga kota hal wi saha udu,mun,ma,aadi wu dhanya dahasakatath adhika pramanayak labagath bawa kiyana gowiyan kipadeneku pilimbaandawa sihalawaththupakaranayehi saha sahassa waththupakaranayehi sandahan wi atha.kawanthissa raju dawasa ruhune girijanapadaye nitolpitiyanam gamada wisu ek pawulaka sohoyuriyan pas deneku ekathuwa maha wanayak heli kara, kanu mul udura udu wapirima sandaha henak sakas kota gath bawa mahahawansayehi sandahan we.me katha wasthuwalin heli wanne anuradhapura yugaye prathama bhagayedi hen gowithan kramaya diwayina purama sarthakawa pawathwagena gos athi bawaya.anuradhapura yugaye dewana bhagayedi me waga kramaya merata pawathi bawa dahawana siyawasata ayath sel lipiyaka sandahan we.ema boga wagawa "sena"yanuwen hadunwa atha.ekala bahula washayen waga kerunu mada wi ha hal wi walata amatharawa thawath pradhana dhanya warga pahak waga kota athi bawa anuradhapura yugayata ayath pathapothin heli we .sumangala wilasiniyehi me dhanya pas wargaya hadunwa di aththe godhuma ,yawa,kangu,waraka ha kudrasaka yanuweni .sikhawalanda winisehi dakwena paridi ema dhanya pas wargaya wuye godhuma(thirigu)yawa (barli) thana hal, wara ha hamuya.

oonama mathiwaranayakata muhuna diya haki pragathishili peramunak godanangiya yuthuyi | dinamina niwasa oonama mathiwaranayakata muhuna diya haki pragathishili peramunak godanangiya yuthuyi shri lanka nidahas pakshaye madhya sakachchawak paksha karyalaye di pawathi athara madhya prakashaka, amathi mahinda samarasinha mahatha ha shri lanka nidahas pakshaye maha lekam mahacharya rohana lakshman piyadasa mahatha adahas dakwana ayuru chayarupa - niroshan batepola elambaena janadhipathiwaranaya, maha mathiwaranaya athulu siyalu mathiwarana walata shakthimathwa muhuna diya haki paridi shri lanka nidahas pakshaya, eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya menma siyalu pragathishili balawega eekarashi karamin pulul peramunak godanagime jathika wagakima siyalu dena wetha me mohothe pawarena bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye maha lekam mahacharya rohana lakshman piyadasa mahatha prakasha keleya.
